comments.en: Separate photoconductor drum and toner cartridge

Known not to use a standard protocol as PostScript or PCL; not to be confused with the EPL-5900.

Dr H. T. Leung and Roberto Ragusa have developed a driver; based on reverse-engineering of the printer's protocol.

The printer has parallel and USB connectors.

This printer probably works with this driver but was not tested yet. Any test report is welcome.
